0.1.name: wordpress/jetpack-gplus-provider
0.1.description:
Simply add the google +1 button to sharedaddy.

Please note :

  • Language option is not working at the moment
  • This plugin is at it's early stage of developpment. Use just for testing and feedback to : http://magnetik.org/en/tech/wordpress/english-google-plus-one-1-button-for-sharedaddy-jetpack/
